titleStmt.title: Mrs. Mary Green, living at a haberdasher of hats, next door to the Three-Crane-Tavern in Chancery-Lane; hath by the blessing of God, and many years practice, learned a most excellent method of curing these distempers here under-mentioned. These are to Certifie all Persons whom it may Concern, that Mrs. Mary Green in Chancery-Lane, is Licensed by His Grace, the Lord Archbishop of Canterbury, for the Great Cures she hath performed on several Persons.
titleStmt.author: Green, Mary, Mrs.
